name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 408 | Daily Firewood Preparation for Farm Life
description:
This NFT documents a routine but essential activity at MaMeeFarm™ on
29 December 2025 at 09:41 (Asia/Bangkok).

The image records the act of cutting firewood as part of daily preparation to sustain life within the farm.
Firewood is required for cooking and caring for multiple lives — both humans and animals — especially in a context with limited resources.

This proof represents continuity of responsibility, not productivity.
It records preparation, readiness, and care carried out every day, regardless of conditions.

Captured and preserved under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
